BlackTitle.description: Black player's title (GM, IM, FM, etc.)

WhiteTitle.description: White player's title (GM, IM, FM, etc.)

BlackClock.description: Space separated clock times for black (Lichess)

Moves.description: Space separated game moves in algebraic notation

Site.description: URL to lichess game where game was played

Termination.description: How the game ended (Normal, Time forfeit, etc.)

WhiteClock.description: Space separated clock times for white (Lichess)

metadata.description: Quality chess games (non-Bot, non-Bullet, > 3 ply) from lichess rated db dumps

white_to_play.description: Boolean indicating if it's White's turn to move

white_castle_kingside_rights.description: Boolean indicating if White can castle kingside

white_castle_queenside_rights.description: Boolean indicating if White can castle queenside

black_castle_kingside_rights.description: Boolean indicating if Black can castle kingside

black_castle_queenside_rights.description: Boolean indicating if Black can castle queenside

half_move_clock.description: Number of half-moves since last pawn move or capture (for 50-move rule)

ply.description: Total number of half-moves played in the game

fen.description: Full FEN (Forsyth-Edwards Notation) string representing the position

white_queen_count.description: Number of White queens on the board

white_knight_count.description: Number of White knights on the board

white_pawn_count.description: Number of White pawns on the board

white_rook_count.description: Number of White rooks on the board

white_dark_bishop_count.description: Number of White bishops on dark squares

white_light_bishop_count.description: Number of White bishops on light squares

black_queen_count.description: Number of Black queens on the board

black_knight_count.description: Number of Black knights on the board

black_pawn_count.description: Number of Black pawns on the board

black_rook_count.description: Number of Black rooks on the board

black_dark_bishop_count.description: Number of Black bishops on dark squares

black_light_bishop_count.description: Number of Black bishops on light squares

metadata.description: Position-by-position analysis of chess games with piece counts and game state
notes: Each row represents a single position in a chess game
Bishops are categorized by square color (dark/light) for tactical analysis
FEN string provides complete position representation
Half-move clock tracks progress toward 50-move rule
Ply count represents total moves from game start
